reviewText: I bought this DVD from Amazon but it's in Chinese with Chinese sub titles.  No English at all!  Not recommended unless you speak Chinese!

This DVD does *NOT* contain English subtitles as advertised. It seems that this terms refers to a few English phrases spoken in English. i was able though to download a subtitle file
(i.e from here :[...]
Instructions to use these are found here:
[...]

Saw this movie in an airplane on a return trip from Italy, I never thought a movie that was made in China could be this funny, believe me it is. A real lot of comedy coming out of serious situations.. One of the best foreign films in my movie collection.
